Name of agent  Name of firm

Data validation:
String
Companies House Character Validation
min 1 max 160 chars
Business rules: An Error message will be displayed if data is not provided

Data validation:
10 digits
min 10, max 10
Use UTR Check Sum to validate the UTR
Business rules:
The CT UTR must be validated using UTR Check Sum detailed below this table.

Data Items: Is the reporting company (or their authorised agent) submitting this revocation form?
Business rules:
If answer=No, then details to identify the company making the appointment must be completed:

item 3.1 - Company name of the company making the revocation
item 3.2 - UK Tax reference - unique taxpayer reference (UTR)

ID: 3. Identity of company making revocation - Required if the Reporting Company or Agent is NOT completing the revocation details

Data Items: Company name of the company making revocation
Business rules:
If UK company, complete the following items,
item 6C - UK Tax reference - CT UTR

Data validation:
10 digit numerical
min 10 max 10 chars,
Use UTR Checksum  to validate the UR is correct
Business rules:
If present confirm UTR using UTR Check Sum detailed below
If CT UTR is present, then 'Country of incorporation' cannot be present
An error message will be displayed if the UTR Checksum gives an error

Data validation:
2 chars
Stored as  ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format
(display country name to user)
Business rules: If 'Country of incorporation' is present, then 'CT UTR' cannot be present
LEI is an alpha numerical field that is 20 characters in length

Data Items: Tax reference - unique taxpayer reference (CT UTR)
Data validation:
10 digit numerical
min 10 max 10 chars,
Use UTR Checksum to validate the UR is correct
Business rules:
M if Ultimate Parent is UK
An error message will be displayed if the UTR Checksum gives an error

Data validation:
2 chars
Stored as  ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format
(display country name to user)
Business rules: M if Ultimate Parent is Non-UK
LEI is an alpha numerical field that is 20 characters in length

Data Items: Start date of worldwide group period of account
Business rules:
Cannot be a future date
No validation required for how far in the past the Start date entered can be
Back-end date to be stored as : ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD
An Error message will be displayed if data is not provided

Data Items: End date of worldwide group period of account
Business rules:
The end date must be a min of 1 day and a max of 18 months after the start date
Error will be displayed if the end date is more than 18 months after the start date .
Back-end date to be stored as : ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD
An Error message will be displayed if data is not provided

ID: 6. Eligible companies who have authorised the notice

Data validation:
String
Alpha numeric - min 1 max 160 chars
Validation to be same as that for Companies House
Business rules:
At least 1 company must be entered
An Error message will be displayed if data is not provided

Data Items: UK Tax reference - unique taxpayer reference (UTR)
Data validation:
10 digit numerical
min 10 max 10 chars,
Use UTR Checksum to validate the UR is correct
Business rules:
An Error message will be displayed if data is not provided
An error message will be displayed if the UTR Checksum gives an error
If return does not meet declaration criteria then it is deemed invalid
